trans-unit.source: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.
trans-unit.target: 畫面格是支援巡覽的內容控制項。

trans-unit.source: Frame is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content.
trans-unit.target: 框架是可讓您瀏覽並顯示內容的內容控制項。

trans-unit.source: Frame can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements.
trans-unit.target: 框架可以將服務裝載在其他內容時，就像其他控制項與項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When the Frame control navigates to HTML content, the Frame control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 時的框架控制項巡覽至 HTML 內容、 Frame 控制項在內部具現化的原生 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: WPF 可讓安全性功能，藉由套用到 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項功能的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications.
trans-unit.target: 套用的功能控制項不同 Xbap 和獨立的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running.
trans-unit.target: 某些應用程式應該套用額外的功能以防止執行惡意內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 WebBrowser 控制項和功能控制項 」 一節[安全性 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[WebBrowser 控制項概觀與教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] files.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是任何類型的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)]物件和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]檔案。

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，不過，頁面是慣用的方式瀏覽的套件內容 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以藉由設定導覽<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29> When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], Frame returns an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種的下列多載<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>-<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29>當內容導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，畫面格傳回的物件，包含的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts an object: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%29> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29> The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigated> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationProgress> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationStopped> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.LoadCompleted> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation> Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: 或者，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法多載會接受物件︰ 可以透過下列事件追蹤- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%29>-<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29>巡覽的存留期:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigated>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationProgress>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationStopped>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.LoadCompleted>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation>Not 發生巡覽每次引發所有事件，則為所都引發的事件集由類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （已取消已停止或失敗)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%28System.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") During or after a navigation, Frame provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明這些事件將引發順序︰![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")畫面格期間或之後的導覽，提供所巡覽，包括內容的相關資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]正要巡覽之內容 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>)、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前內容的 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CurrentSource%2A>)，並包含所巡覽之內容的物件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CurrentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, Frame records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 當內容導覽至時，框架會記錄為項目導覽巡覽記錄中。

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法，或瀏覽至 向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目向前巡覽記錄瀏覽至的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A>報表是否有後方的項目及向前巡覽記錄，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, Frame automatically displays a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 第一次的一項內容的瀏覽至時從另一段內容、 框架會自動顯示巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]可讓使用者在後及向前巡覽記錄中巡覽。

trans-unit.source: You can configure when the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is shown by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]顯示藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, Frame will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, Frame) with its own navigation history cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，框架會使用它自己的巡覽記錄只有當父導覽 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>，框架) 使用它自己的瀏覽歷程記錄找不到。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator.
trans-unit.target: 這表示框架的瀏覽歷程記錄項目會針對父導覽 mingled 與瀏覽歷程記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: To specify that a Frame manages its own navigation history, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 Frame 管理它自己的巡覽記錄中，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 向後巡覽記錄中最新的項目可以藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A>移除

trans-unit.source: Frame does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 框架不會儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, Frame creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，畫面格建立內容物件的新執行個體使用巡覽記錄中巡覽至每一次。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 此行為被為了避免過多的記憶體耗用量在巡覽大量內容時。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供數種技術，其中您可以儲存的狀態一段內容巡覽記錄中。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>，您也可以記住多重集的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Frame Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Frame controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 框架控制項以自訂適用於多個框架控制項，使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Frame, see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於框架的狀態，請參閱[框架樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Frame control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在畫面格控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中包含的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref>物件，表示與特定的內容相關聯的應用程式定義狀態。

trans-unit.source: state is , and a object is not returned from .
trans-unit.target: state是 ，和物件不會傳回從。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> does not allow children.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>不允許子系。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property to set content.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性來設定內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to prevent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> from adding text.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>加入文字。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至物件的文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，可用來列舉向後巡覽記錄中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by BackStack including whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: 上一頁堆疊包括整個內容、 片段巡覽，以及自訂狀態所傳回的項目。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> if at least one entry has been added to back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>如果可以在瀏覽歷程記錄已加入至少一個項目。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: If there are not entries, or the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> does not own its own navigation history, BackStack is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有項目，或<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>並未擁有它自己的巡覽記錄上一頁堆疊是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基底[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: BaseUri can be set to aid resolution of relative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for further navigation.
trans-unit.target: BaseUri 可以設定以協助解析相對[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]進一步瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: This is protected virtual property and cannot be used directly, although can be used in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 這是受保護的虛擬屬性，不能直接使用，雖然可以用在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: If navigation history for a frame is managed by a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the `GoBack` method on that navigator or associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object must be called: - GoBack - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽歷程記錄的框架如果受父導覽 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)、`GoBack`該導覽器 上的方法或相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>物件必須先呼叫:-GoBack- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: GoBack is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目時，會呼叫 GoBack。

trans-unit.source: If navigation history for a frame is managed by a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the `GoForward` method on that navigator or associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object must be called: - GoForward - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>負責管理自己的瀏覽歷程記錄，或瀏覽歷程記錄管理使用父導覽至 (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is hosted in content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Window>).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>只有當父瀏覽主機會使用自己的瀏覽歷程記錄 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 找不到具有本身的日誌 (例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>裝載所裝載的內容中<xref:System.Windows.Window>)。</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to manage its own navigation history, set JournalOwnership to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>管理自己的瀏覽歷程記錄設定至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership> JournalOwnership</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> uses <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to support navigation for hosted content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>以支援裝載的內容瀏覽。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: NavigationService is useful for code that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService 可用於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>取得<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>參考</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>裝載程式碼

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, should use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: 內容是由裝載<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>，應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A>取得的參考至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > NavigationService does not return a reference to the same NavigationService as calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> and passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> does.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > NavigationService 不會傳回參考與呼叫相同的 NavigationService<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>和傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>未。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The former returns the NavigationService that is owned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> while the latter returns the NavigationService for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is hosted.
trans-unit.target: 前者會傳回擁有者是 NavigationService<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>而後者會傳回 NavigationService 導覽的導覽主機所在的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>裝載。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets #NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/nsgnsvsfnssnippets/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode1)][!code-cs[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets #NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode1)][!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets #NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/nsgnsvsfnssnippets/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode2) ] [!code-cs [NSGNSvsFNSSnippets #NSFrameDiffCODE2 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode2)]

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> can show its navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>可以顯示其巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> shows its navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>顯示其導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]自動第一個項目加入至時瀏覽歷程記錄。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: The navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會維持可見，以向後或向前巡覽按鈕才會成為適當地啟用或停用，以反映後方的項目數量及向前巡覽記錄。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>若要<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>您設定<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility>至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility>如果您想要隱藏巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default <xref uid="langword_csharp_Internet " name="Internet " href=""></xref>permission set).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>隔離外部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]內容部分信任安全性沙箱內 (預設值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Internet " name="Internet " href=""></xref>權限集合)。

trans-unit.source: External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 外部內容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並未隨附於應用程式資源檔案或內容檔案的內容 (請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。

trans-unit.source: When SandboxExternalContent is `true`, and the source for the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set.
trans-unit.target: SandboxExternalContent 時`true`，和內容的來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>為外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，將內容載入至僅限於預設部分信任安全性沙箱`Internet`權限集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 外部內容後續載入不同的處理序。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>).
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，外部內容會變成隔離，而且沒有存取應用程式範圍的資源，例如資源字典 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>)。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> will only contain external content when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>只會包含外部內容時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>屬性設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> content that is provided using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>使用提供的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性會被視為內部內容，而且此後，不隔離。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: 會停止進一步下載目前的瀏覽要求的內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current context.
